 Hi,

       LSTM-NEAT c++ code has been uploaded (File LSTM-Neat.zip)
   =
This an example of how adding a fixed memory block is able to boost
evoluti=
on of NEAT. Serial XOR has been implemented.

   You can change number of L=
STM blocks and LSTM cells per block in
the file "param.ini". Serial pattern=
s are in file "serial_xor.nat".

You can see the differences in evolution s=
peed changing, in file
"params.ini" ->
LSTM_Blocks 1 
LSTM_Cells 1
   To ->=

LSTM_Blocks 0 
LSTM_Cells 0

    A compiled version (.exe) has been added =
too.

   Germ=E1n.
